notes_translated.fr: Le Programme de mesure de la performance des services municipaux recueille chaque annee des donnees sur les services des municipalites par l'intermediaire du rapport d'information financiere. Les donnees recueillies servent a mesurer la performance des services concernant : * la protection-incendie; * la police; * les routes; * le transport en commun; * les eaux usees; * les eaux pluviales; * l'eau potable; * la gestion des dechets solides; * les parcs et loisirs; * les bibliotheques; * l'amenagement du territoire; * le batiment.
notes_translated.en: The Municipal Performance Measurement Program collects municipal services data on an annual basis as a part of the Financial Information Return. The data measures performance related to: * municipal fire departments * police * roadways * transit * wastewater * storm water * drinking water * solid waste management * parks and recreation * library services * land-use planning * building services
